name: Savior Lumen
movement: 20 ft. walk, 20 ft. burrow, 50 ft. fly, 30 ft. swim
description: A large celestial being that manipulates light, characterized by its ability to emit bright light and alter memories. It is amphibiotic, able to adapt to both air and water environments.
memorable: Its ability to force enemies to perceive it as mere glowing lights can disorient foes and change the dynamics of combat.
goals: To support allies and manipulate light and perception in battle.
relations: Often found alongside other good-aligned creatures and allies of the celestial realm.
environment: Can be found in divine realms, near bodies of water, or places of light and positivity.
strengths: Immune to poison and several debilitating conditions; possesses magic resistance and strong mobility options.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to certain magical effects despite its spells resistance.
attacks: Can unleash a Flurry of Tools for multi-type melee damage and has a Dismantle action for utility outside combat.
most_powerful_ability: Fleeting Memory, which can confuse and disorient targets by altering their perception of the Savior Lumen.
senses: Has a passive perception of 15, making it relatively aware of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in perception, enhancing its awareness and ability to notice hidden threats.
additional_information: Emits bright light in a 20-foot radius, providing illumination during combat.
Does not require food, drink, or sleep, allowing for continuous activity.
Can occupy another creature's space for versatile movement.
Can treat itself as a single large creature for carrying capabilities.
Can cast a variety of spells without requiring material components.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like Floating Disk, Mending, and Spare the Dying at will, along with Gentle Repose, Knock, and Sending three times per day.
test_queries: creature that alters memories in combat
large light-emitting celestial in aquatic environments
